inn1.comm: Pollock starts with a off cutter that beats the big defensive stride from Masakadza, got the inside edge to save a huge appeal
this one shapes away from Sibanda, leaves and good carry to de Villiers keeping wicket
once again going away off the seam, no shot
on the button from the start from Pollock, pitches and goes away off the seam, well left alone
on line, fullish, goes on the drive but the movement again gets the right hand side of the driving bat, ball hardly gets off the table
well forward and defending, to end a good over from Pollock
angled into the right hander, gets the outter half of the bat and runs away to the 3rd man
well forward to the ball angled in, good length and accordingly defended back down the pitch
touch wide outside off and not tempted, good leave
left again, this time a bit closer to that off stump as it angles in late off the pitch
not taking any chances as he once again leaves one just outside the off, that left the batsman off the pitch
touch short of a length, cuts back into the defensive back foot stroke
just short of length, good bounce as he stands up in the crease to defend down the pitch. that hit high up on the bat
no shot left alone as it shapes away from the bat
line and length brings out the forward defence, no width being given at this stage
and again, can only get a big stride in and can only defend down the pitch
slightly outside the off, great length here from Pollock, pushes forward to cover
fuller ball angled at the leg stump, agressive stroke to the on side can only find the man at mid-on
width outside off, touch short, cuts well, that is slapped out the middle and races away to backward point
angled in, gets forward on the drive, beaten and into the pad, huge appeals but Tiffen says down the leg, just may be right with that but it was very close, good decision though
well forward, defends pushing gently towards cover
angled in at the legs again, bowls from fairly wide of the crease, good length meets the forward defence
all defensive from the front foot, did get well into line this time
fuller at the leg stump, attempts to force the clip to the on side, inside edges into the pad, Ntini very close to the appeal as he throws his arms into the air
just short of length, gets back forcing straight, Pollock gathers in the follow through, both batsmen struggling to rotate the strike
dont have to rotate the strike when you drive like that, touch full on the leg stump is neatly punched, strong right hand, through midwicket
left alone outside off as the ball shapes away
short just outside the off, that gets up with ooohhhs  and aaahhs  from being the wicket, good leave
off cutter gets up from just outside off, got forward, inside edge gets up into the elbow, that hurt
all sorted as the ice does its work with another forward defence ending the over
angled into the legs, whips that off the toes, in the air, straight at Bosman at backward square leg, ooops, down it goes, and easy chance, did come quickly but he hardly had to move
left alone, that cuts back a lot from wide of the off, still missed by a good gap
left alone again, also came in off the pitch but was a bit shorter so a good leave on length
gets forward, inside edge as that follows him on the back foot, squirts away to the on side
a beauty from Ntini, touch short of a length, angled in, then straightens and lifts off the pitch, and has Sibanda pushing at that about chest high getting the fientest of edges to de Villiers
nearly does it again, fuller, angled in, straightens, Taylor pushes forward and is beaten, Taylor just may have played inside it
left alone outside off
the run miser legs on go at the leg stump, clipped forward of square leg and Bosman makes a bit of a mess of it, Morne Morkel chases, but is just beaten to the midwicket boundary
well forward defending
left alone outside off as Pollock gets back on line and length
touch short outside off, forces off the back foot, not timed as that bounces away to cover
slower ball on line, touch straight from the old man, drives down the ground but can not beat the mid-on
2 slips in for Ntini who draws Taylor forward and leaves
well forward, and was that a slower ball from Ntini, just may well have been, do not see that too often, defends to the off
well forward, defends down the pitch
Taylor having a good look at what is going on, gets well forward and defends to the off
this one is left just outside off as he gets it to leave the pitch going away from the bat
full at the legs, flicks to the on side, in the air but only just eludes the man at midwicket
slower ball on line, nearly goes through with the shot, checks the shot and defends to the off
just on line and once again we see a fairly good looking forward defence, not a tought of rotating the strike
left alone outside off, just short outside off, leaves him off the pitch
again left alone
slower ball is pushed down the off side of the pitch
just back of a length, taylor is forward early, has to stand up a bit as he defends back down the pitch, Pollock gets a hand to it
once more we see a coaching book forward defence, almost as good as the first day of a test match
very strange tactics from Zimbabwe as we see the ball pushed to the off
just outside off and that is left to keep de Villiers hands warm
just on the off, forward, pushes to the off
that might keep him from getting onto the front foot, the bouncer is fired in and Masakadza has to do some body bending to get out of the way of that
Good SHOT, just short of length, straight, and punched down the ground inside mid-on
slower off cutter, defends down the ground
just on the off, that cuts back at the right hander, defends, inside edge into the pad and runs down the pitch
fuller ball on the off, drives firmly at cover
good length but too straight and that is flicked, fairly wristy off the legs forward of the fine leg, good running as they beat the return from Dale Steyn
short outside off, gets back and tries to cut that over the slip area, beaten, dangerous shot but both batsman and bowler get away with it
back on line and length, defends to the off
Starts well, just on the off, short of length, good bounce through to de Villiers
touch too straight, worked off the legs to the on side
all defensive, to the off
left alone on length, just short, gets up and clears the middle stump well
pushes forward just outside off, withdraws the bat late and leaves
angled into the pads, taylor is looking to work that leg side, is beaten into the back pad, no appeal
strats with some away swing that is left outside the off
that is a touch full and is well driven through the off side, that brings some excitement to a smallish crowd
outside off, full, swings, but started wide and is called
outside off, again away swing, full, drives, outside half of the bat, and a slip-up from Gibbs as the bounce beats him at backward point
well forward, defends, squirts off to Gibbs who cleans up neatly this time
left alone outside off, struggling to get a good line with the swing
that too starts a bit wide, swings away more and is called
better line as that is left outside off, also put a bit of back into that one, a lot quicker through to de Villiers
shortish on the off, gets Taylor off the front foot, standing up in the crease and defends well to the off
Morkel oversteps, as he does do frequently, left alone outside off
full on the legs, dabs into the gap at forward square leg, good running, specially after the 5 run outs in Bulawayo
angled at the legs again, gets the edge into the pad, loops away short of backward square leg
all defensive from the front foot, rolls away to the off, with Ntini screaming encouragement from the field, and boy can he make a noise
oversteps again, but a great ball, pitch and lept through the back foot defence
outside off, short of length, runs that down to 3rd man
all defensive standing up in the crease, no real foot work has him pushing at that as it leaves him, well beaten
left alone outside off
left outside off, getting a lot of away swing and that only just flew past inside the guide line
great nut, that has pace and swing, drew him forward and was well beaten on the front foot
and after a great ball, sends down a half tracker, width, crashed over gully from the back foot, shot!! as he intentionally goes over the slip/gully area
better ball, gets him defending from the front foot, outside half of the bat takes it into the covers
just short of length, swings away, touch to wide and is left alone
quick and on line, good bounce has him defending to the off
well forward, quick again from Morkel, hurries the shot, fairly defensive, but great timing as that runs away inside the mid-on
left alone outside the off
just short of a length, moves enough off the seam, Masakadza is back, no foot work at all, pushes away from the body and gives the edge to de Villiers, poor shot neith forward, back or sideways
just outside off, short of length, and Taibu has the time to watch that through as he leaves
again outside off, left alone, nice easy welcome for the new bat
left alone outside off
full on the leg, nearly gets through, taylor almost on the back foot, has the get the bat down in a hurry, runs it to the on side
all defensive to the off
touch short but right on line, gets back and stands tall defending to the off
fuller ball but again great line brings out the defensive that he has been working on all morning
left alone outside off
that is too wide, maybe trying to bowl a bit too quick, falling over in the delivery
and again that is even wider, Taibu getting a very easy introduction to his innings
that is over corrected and the flick of the pad from Taibu saves a third wide
left alone outside off, good bounce again outside off, bounce made even higher by the shortness of the batsman
well forward and over that, just on the off, pushed into the gap at cover
played from the crease, standing up and dabbing to the on side
left alone outside off
on the back foot, gets beaaten by a bit of an off cutter, taken high on the back pad flap
starts outside off, swings away, left
gets that one right, starts middle and leg, swings away, draws the batsman forward and beats the edge
follows the good ball up with a short ball, well outside off, and that is cut firmly out of the middle, over the gully, over the third man and over the boundary
just on the off, this time all defensive to the off
not moving the feet too well, gets half trapped in the crease inside edging into the pad
leaves outside off, just not interested in going after the ball or at least rotating the strike
all defensive, just playing with two cemented feet, pushing to the off
thats too short and this time he slaps the cut past Gibbs at point
outside off, left alone
full on the off, stroked from the front foot to cover
full again, gets well forward for a short man, defends to the off
fullish on the off, drives gently into the covers

short ball, pulls very well and high, Bosman at deep midwicket, runs to get under it, does not see himself crossing the boundary ropes and dives straight into the hoardings, that looked very bad, the hoarding of course made from metal
short again and Taibu says thakyou I will repeat the shot, sends that over the boundary at wide midwicket with Bosman now on the stretcher and being taken away
forward to the on side, dabs wide of midwicket
starts too full and drives well, full of confidence
better length and played on merit, defends to the off
just outside off, not interested, leaves for de Villiers
no shot offered outside off
line and length, defends towards cover
just a touch too wide to get taibu interested, left alone
starts a touch full, pushed to the on side
full on the off, goes over the top, well struck lofted drive
well forward, just on the off, defends to the off
touch of width well taken by Taibu as he drives into the gap in the covers, just steered that into the gap and he is very quick between the wickets
and again, not looking to smash it, just [lays gently into the gap, should only be one for a normal player but he is like lightning between the stumps
well forward, defends to the off, been in long enough now to get things moving
and moving he does, moves his feet, thats a first, and lofts that over mid-off, Smith chases but touches the rope as he slides after it
touch shorter ball, gets forward from the crease, dabs to the off
pushes to the on side, taken off the hips, de Villiers round quick, near mix-up but Taylor called no early enough for the little sprinter to get back
back into his shell, defends down the pitch
gets across in the crease, feet really working now, dabs down from lie towards Steyn at fine leg, fielder is a bit slow and Taibu is quick to notice, ends up as an easy two
short and wide, cuts, no contact, that was a chance missed by Taibu
this time he does leave outside the off
that starts straight, slight away movement, taibu looks to the on side and only just keeps a leading edge under control to cover
line and length, all defensive to the off, playing everything on merit, crashing anything loose, and defending when he has too
line and length from Albie brings out another defence
touch leg side, touch full, and just as you praise the batsman he slips up and takes a run off the pad
anything up to the bat must go and it does, foot down the pitch and a controlled lofted drive over the mid-on
full again, this time he drives out to the on side
just back of a length, gets forward and stroked to the deep cover, they think two, but good attacking fielding from the man at deep cover
defends to the off, Philander staying fairly straight
straight again, just aboput on length, defends to the on side
goes too straight and that is an easy dab away to the on side for the run
defends to the on side, easy run wide of midwicket
well forward, defends to the off
short, width, kitchen sink thrown at that, slices the cut over gully

short of length on the off, looks to pull from the front foot, gets it high on the bat, also played slightly early, goes high towards fine leg where Philander has to make a meter or two to take a comfortable catch
shortish ball, gets up, and Taylor stands up in the crease and pushes to the off
good line and length, defends with a slight movent in the front foot, rolls to the off
starts on line and makes the new batsman play, pushing it just across the left hander
well forward, pitched outside leg, thuds into the pad, huge appeal, but good decision as they take the run
touch too straight as taylot just gently stands up and turns it to fine leg
short, pulls, missed, takes the ball in the side, hopefully he has a chest guard
well forward, angled just across him, defends
turned off the hips to backward square leg, Ntini has to give his lips a rest and work for his hands as he cuts that off
Thats too short on the legs and is pulled easily over the backward square leg
well forward on the off, ball angled across the left hander, defends to the off
touch full on the off, drives past extra cover, picks one of the longest boundaries, nearly ran four but decide against it
thats too wide outside the leg, having problems with the left and right handers
better line on the off, defends down the pitch
better bowling from Morkel, defends to the off
seems to have found the length now, will have to wait for the left hander to face to see if he has
thats a good end to the over, line and length, defends to the off
starts too fulol outside the off and that half volley is put away through the covers
flighted up and pushed wide of the cover
just on the off, but does get the foot across and stroked wide of deep cover
dabs from length into the vacant on side
lets that slip down the left handers leg side
too short outside off, cuts behind square to long leg
touch full, drives down and wide of the cover sweeper
starts down the leg side and is nudged off the pads to fine leg
touch short outside off, cuts but not timed to backward point, de Villiers jumping high standing up to the stumps
just on the off, and dabs away to the off, back into that dab from the crease with very little foot work
too short, spins around on that as he mistimes a pull past midwicket
just on the off, fuller ball, defends down the pitch
finishes well Pollock, just that niggling length on the off and forceing the defensive shot
well forward, big stride, dabs to the off for a quick easy run
touch short, pulls to the on side sets off and nearly collides with Williams, that saves a run
outside off, flighted, driven to deep cover
finds the length and brings out the defensive prod
too short, long hop pulled away behind square leg
flighted up, not tempted, pushes that down the pitch to Duminy
slower off cutter on line, Williams does have a big stride forward, stroked to cover
touch short on the legs, gets back and gently punches wide of mid-on
not much Taylor can do to that, line and length is defended to the off
thats a quicker ball, full on the off, takes first taylor by surprise as he is late on the shot and de Villiers fumbles as the bat is beaten
not giving anything away, just on the off, almost hitting a second set of stumps, defends to the off
and again, spot on line and length, Taylor all defensive
full on the legs, stroked out to midwicket
thats bad luck for Taylor and fortune to Steyn thanks to Gibbs, a long hop outside the off is crashed on the cut, but Gibbs gets in the way, sticks both hands up in the air and takes a brisk catch
gets an easy start to the innings, leg side ball is tucked away off the hips, and another sprinter comes back for the second as fine leg ambles in
left alone outside off, Steyn will be pleased, still getting away swing, just needs to control it
left alone again as the away swing starts a bit too wide
has to play at that, the one that holds its line, batsman is well into line and gets well over it from the front foot
leg stump line is well flicked down to deep backward square leg
just on the off, huge back lift from Matsi gets everone excited, stroked into the covers
looking to get on the front foot, Pollock fires the short ball in, Matsikenyeri has to jump high, not the tallest batsman but does well to get the bat to it, albeit very high off the face
slow ball outside off is well put away past a chasing extra cover, good looking shot
no width or length given away this time, defends to the off
de Villiers back up to the stumps, Pollocks quicker ball has the batsman hurrying the defensive shot to the off
starts nicely on line to the left hander who pushes to the off, he does get a good stride into his front foot shots
touch full and that big stride helps as he strokes the drive wide of the sweeper
well forward again, plays that slightly later and takes the run wide of backward point
touch leg side, clipped well but too firm and straight at midwicket for any thought of a run
leg stump line again, defends that, slightly short, to the leg side
leg stump line again, clipped to forward square leg, two is the call, but some good fielding has them going back
touch short of length, on line, has him defending to the off, ball did hurry back at him and well kept out
just enough width on the off to stroke the drive past cober to the sweeper
outside off, shortish, gets forward, then cuts late down to third man, nicely played from WIlliams
line and length and defended to the off, Matsikenyeri having to stay in the crease with de Villiers standing up
leg stump line, gets forward and chips it over midwicket, no respect for the old man
fuller ball at the legs, neatly driven down the ground to the deep mid-on, ending Pollocks bowling duties for the day
short of length, leg stump line is neatly turned off the hips to fine leg where Steyn this time attacks the ball and stops the second run
short, leg stump, pulls, not timed, ball drops down at his feet
short of length, outside off, cuts late, not timed well, de Villiers gets around and stops the very late cut
poor ball, Williams likes to cut and gets a gift outside off, sent flying over Gibbs at backward point
fuller outside off, cuts again, more controlled and Gibbs has little to do to field that
on the off drive, angle takes the ball away from the left hander, beaten
full on the off, drives neatly but the cover sweeper is there
outside off, just about a length ball, but played from the front foot to the sweeper
too much width, sweeper is very square and has no time to cut the crashing drive off
slow ball, off cutter, dabs that to the on side and a quick run taken
angled way across the left hander, slashing drive, beaten and that is not called wide,  must have been close to one
slower ball driven down the ground, Matsikenyeri is back in a flash beating the Pollock return
starts down the leg side, flicks fine, just using the Ntini pace, fine leg has no chance
better line as the batsman punches that to the off, not timed, but wide of the cover
full on the off, drives to deep mid-off, struck too well for a run, Matsi has to race back but the return from Albie Morkel is wide
short outside off, likes the cut, sending it down to third man
drives outside off and is beaten for pace
shortish ball angled at the body, gets back jumping to get over it, runs it wide of midwicket
slow ball to start the over is picked up and played off the legs to the on side
short leg side ball is pulled well behind square, Philander dives but he was well beaten as the ball goes away from him
full this time is stroked into the off field
full reversing yorking is fired under the bat, but wide of the off
another yorker fired in, this time straight, kept out and rolls away wide of de Villiers
short in length, gets back outside off and pushes that to the off, and a very good lesson from these two to the top order on how to rotate the strike
line and length is just pushed to the off, soft hands again gets them through for the single
leg stump line, trying to work it to the on side, leading edge is taken on the bounce by the extra cover
pushing forward on the off, plays a bit early, loops away to the off but the mid-off is just too deep
full blooded drive from Williams, inside edge into the pad, rolls to the off, SMith has a go but is wide at the bowlers end
taken off the hips to fine leg, Pollock hesitates enough for the two to come back for what was a far too easy two
well forward and runs that into the gap at cover
short ball, manages to get some bat on it as he falls away to the off, runs away towards fine leg
yorker dug out
width outside off, slashes a drive high but forward and short of Bodi coming round from third man
another yorker is well kept out
leg stump line, hit me hard length is lofted high to cow corner for a two bounce boundary
drives straight, and a easy two with Matsikenyeri coming to the danger end
thats a great shot, makes room to the leg side, angled bat, works that forward of third man
drives down the ground for only one this time
makes room to the leg side, angled bat, runs it to third man
yorker is dug out, no run this time as the ball rolls back to the bowler
full but online, just about yorker length is pushed into the covers
drives down the ground, not timed, that allows them to get as Bodi has a lot to do coming in off the boundary
reverse swing has him driving from the inside half of the bat, rolls out to midwicket
a round the wicket full toss is swung away towards long on
line and length is driven straight towards deep ,id-off
what a shot, full and on line, drives into the ground and over the bowler, too straight for long off to cut that off, nice way to go to 50
pushed into the covers from just on off
reverse again angled in, drives, inside edge into the pad squirting to the off and another great bit of running
leg stump yorker is dug out firmly into the ground and back at a leaping bowler
outside off, swing and a miss
again a full wind up driving outside off, beaten
gets bat on ball this time, just on the off, as full as he can get, dabs to the off
charges down the pitch, looks to go straight down the ground, edges into the pad and wide of the bowler
criminal leg stump ball, flicked fine, no one is going to get around to that
looking to put the foot down, shuffles down the pitch, gets a slower ball angled across him, flashing drive gets the edge, sends it wide of de Villiers who has a bit of ground to cover
greated by a bouncer that does not get up, he has to really duck down low to get out the way
full on line, dug out to the off
leg stump line is turned off the legs to the on side, quick run taken
full and outside off, drives firmly but is trying to hit the cover off that and is beaten
angled short into the body, dabs to the on side, quick run taken, Steyn gets across has a direct hit, they take an extra run from the deflection
full, trying to get into that block hole, dug out to the on side
aims for somewhere in the heavens, swings to the leg side, ball is outside off, beaten
decides to rotate the strike, plays a conventional push to the off into the gap at cover
straight yorker again, but well kept out to the off side
huge swing to somewhere on the leg side, head searching for the clouds, misses and has the stumps split by the full ball
oversteps, but it was a huge leg side wide to the left hander anyway
outside the leg stump again, this time the wide is saved as it clips the back leg on the way through
width, full, but made room outside the leg, smashes the drive past point, and a great 50 for him
slow leg side yorker, worked just wide of a backward square leg
short leg side ball, pulls, but plays way too early, ball through to de Villiers, Bat on Ball is his partners call
good cricket, waits for the slower ball, dabs to cover to get the in man on strike
slower off cutter just on the off deceives the batsman swing for all his might to the on side, misses and only the off stump is left standing
full on the off, drives to the off, cover sweeper has too much to do to save the second and thats the end of the innings

inn2.comm: Game gets under way with a slow short ball that is pulled down to deep backward square leg, Smith almost had to stop the shot and wait before going through with it
thats very wide outside off as Gibbs opens the innings in place of the injured Bosman
wide of the off, must have been close to being called again
outside off, left alone, just a touch wide but legal
outside off and not interseted, gets the bat well above the ball
outside off, gets that bat well above the ball, strange to see when others try and get the bat very low when they leave
no need to play at that and leaves outside off
leg side ball, flicks to the on side, behind square, well gathered by the man just behind the square leg umpire
left alone outside off, Taibu does well taking that standing up
just on the off, nice length for his pace, or lack of pace, defends to the off
fullish on the off, firmly driven straight at the mid-off
good line and length, slight away movement from the left hander, pulls out the shot at the last moment
thats too wide outside off, just pushing it too far across the batsman
just outside off, touch short, chops the cut to a diving gully who can not hold on
well forward on the off, defends towards cover
wide of the off, left alone, only just gets inside the guide lines
just short outside off, cuts well but straight at backward point
fullish on the off, stroked down the ground, bowler gets a hand down on it
shuffles down and across the pitch, bowler follows him and he ends up defending down the pitch
cuts from a bit close to the body, no real timing, runs away behind square to the off
just on the legs, gets forward and works that between the forward midwicket and backward square leg
line and length, on the off, defends to cover
too straight and full to a man that loves the leg side, clipped that wide of midwicket
well forward on the off, nudges defensively into the gap at cover
outside off, no shot
touch wide, Gibbs does get across to this and gently pushes it past cover point from the front foot
angled too far outside the off, goes well away from the left hander, left alone
runs that down to third man
gentle and almost I dont care defence to the off
gets forward, defends to cover
gets well forward, ball is angled to the leg, has to almost play around the front pad to get the bat on ball, defends to the on side
leg stump line, clears the front pad well, lofted to deep wide midwicket where it almost stops where it pitches
staying off Smith's legs, also slight away movement from the left hand bat, defends to the on side
has no option but to defend to the off as that angles across, with late away swing
well forward defends to the off
expansive drive outside off, foot not in line, beaten as Taibu fumbles standing up
left alone just too wide to tempt
thats way down the leg side, taibu standing up has no chance
touch leg side, gets forward, maybe a bit edgy as that squirts down to a short fine leg
short of length, on line, dabs from the back foot to the off
too short, wide of the off, pulls that well through midwicket, just asked to be hit
better line and length, got forward on the drive to extra cover
fullish on line, stroked into the ground and over the bowler, quick run, close call but the ball is fumbles from mid-off
leg stump line, clipped to the on side, hauled in at the midwicket boundary
no stopping this one, touch full and a slaping cover drive beats the infield
starts off very nicely, forcing the defensive push
stays on the lien and length, gets the respectful forward defence
looks to work that to the on side, no clean connection sends it rolling away
touch too short, on it in a flash to deep forward square leg, pulled back just inches from the boundary
on the off, gets forward stroking that lazy looking drive to cover
repeats what appears to be a SUnday afternoon drive, almost effortless, fielded at cover
taken off the legs wide of the fine leg, easy trot through for the two
looks to work that off line to the leg side, bit of an inside edge has the ball going down to deep square leg
line and length, defended to cover
leg stump line, just a touch full, worked off the legs, clean timing that, races away forward of fine leg
all defensive to the off
just outside off, gets well forward and across, defends to cover area
flicked off the legs to backward square leg, well fielded by Dabengwa
outside off, just short of length, played down the line to cover point
works the leg stump ball off the hips, this time beats the backward square leg but not the long leg
Gibbs in no hurry today, gently dabs to the covers
then he unleashes a slashing drive off the back foot that has the covers standing and looking at each other
back into the Sunday afternoon mode, defends down the on side of the pitch
just a touch straight and is whipped away to the on side where Matsikenyeri does well at forwarde midwicket
gently forward on the off and stroked into the covers
more agression in this drive but can not find the gap
slower leg side ball, Smith beaten into the pads by the lack of pace
driving out the off, beaten by a bit of bounce, Taibu takes high gets the bails off, but TV shows Smith has his toe behind the line
way down the leg
leg stump line, that last bounce must have worried him, plays carefully to the on side
lazy looking defensive stroke to the off
not urgency again from Gibbs, strokes to cover
on line, defends to the off
turns it on when he has too, touch to short on the off, rocks back and whips that through and over midwicket
left alone outside off
almost as if someone is switching him on and off, gets a line and length ball and defends down the pitch
width and a crashing drive races away square of the pitch
this time he drives, not as cleanly, a thick outside edge sees the ball split the point and gully
round the wicket from Brent, overpitches and make that three in a row as he drives wide of extra cover
drags that down a bit and has SMith defending off the back foot
drives from length towards mid-on, quick run, throw is direct but deflects was the backup for an extra run
just on the off, slower ball, checks the drive and strokes into the off side field
leg stump line, whipped away behind square, valiant attempt by a diving deep square leg but the body touching the boundary
drives down the ground and wide of long off
take that, cracking drive, shuffling down and forcing past mid-on for his 50
just outside off, looks to dab the cut close to the body, harmlessly runs it to the gully
all defensive gets down low on the front foot
expansive drive again, but fircing and not timed, bounds away towards mid-off
Gibbs in the meantime is happy to switch on and off when he wants to, nudges that down to third man
Smith too runs that off the front foor to third man
outside off, stroked and timed towards extra cover, fumble lets them take a run
short bouncer, pulls well in front of midwicket
good recovery from Mpofu, hits the right spots and forces the watchful defence from Smith
good come back from the bowler, just on the off, nice length, just as neatly played from the front foot
has a good look, leaves outside off
flicks the switch to ON, gets the short ball, pulls from his knee past square leg, flicks the switch to OFF
well forward on the on side, dabs to midwicket
all defensive, ball flighted up, good line
gets well forward, works that off line towards a short fine leg
well forward, defends to the off
leg stump line, flicks fine but straight at short fine leg
touch full and is driven firmly down the ground to long on
short ball, waits and pulls, picks the only man at deep midwicket out, walking run taken
outside off, back, cuts late, teasing chase by the gully is won by the ball
defends from the front foot
full on the legs, drives neatly along the grass to long on
well forward on the off, pushes to cover
outside leg, sweeps late and fine, can not beat the short fine leg
outside off, turn takes it away further, cuts, gully gathers
leg side, nudges to square leg
touch short as Gibbs whips that around but straight at deep square leg
leg stump line, sweeps against the spin, not timed, but beats the short fine leg, not enough on it to go to the boundary
sweeps fine from the leg stump, straight at short fine leg
flighted on line, stroked to midwicket
sweeps fine again, this time short fine leg has no answer as it whizzes past him
line and length, defends to the off, rolling it back down the pitch
flighted outside off, drives well, sweeper at deep cover gets around
sweeps at the low full toss, bit of a top edge that clears the man at short fine leg, but lucky that time
bit full to cut off the front foot, drags it to point area
sweeps with the turn now, runs it firmly to long leg
double steps down the leg side, drives cleanly to long on
falls away as he forces the cut outside off, beaten
fullish on the legs, clips that down to long on
flighted on the off, neat looking drive down the ground for long off to cut off
full on the legs, playing straight down the ground, good to see that from Smith, does not always have to work it square, long on defends
just on line and length, getting turn, defends to the off
uses his feet forcing to the off, right hand drags that down to long on
touch short, looks to work that to leg but can not beat the short fine leg
outside off, full, sweeps firmly, top edge into the pad, loops up, Taibu tries to get forward to it but lucky Smith this time
loopy flight, not tempted, taps that back at the bowler
makes room to the leg, slaps straight at cover point
well forward, smothers to the on side
touch short, leans back, almost off balance as he slashes that forward of the cover sweeper who cuts off
uses the feet, drives firmly and straight, neither long off or on can get across
holds that back a bit, Smith was coming, stops and nudges just wide of midwicket
uses the feet, turns that into a full toss but can not beat the long on
all defensive, runs it gently down the pitch
down the pitch from Gibbs, lofted drive, not controlled, but again the cricket gods favour Gibbs as that lands just short of long on
fullish on the legs, drives to long on
this is getting all to easy for the two at the crease, another simple singles as he strokes down the ground
Smith this time drives to long off
sweeps firmly, beats the bat on the leg side, clips the something, maybe the bat hitting the ground, huge appeal from Taibu, wide is the answer
sweeps a lot better to deep backward square leg
Gibbs goes down the ground and another easy single
drives firmly straight back at the bowler
uses his feet, gets to the pitch and lofts that over long-on, not as cleanly as he had hoped, that just cleared the boundary
cuts outside the off, but does not have the beating of cover point
sweeps well this time, gets well over it racing it forward of square leg who does just as well in keeping that to two
short outside off, plays the cut but forcing it he drags it down the ground just wide of long off
all defensive to the off
down the pitch, hits down the line, clean strike beats the man at long on and 50 for Gibbs
touch short, drives past the sweeper from the back foot
short on the leg side and this time he puts it away past deep midwicket
gets a decent ball and shows Dabengwa some respect with a defensive push to the off
has a good look at the change of bowling, defends from line and length to the off
uses the feet comes down the pitch, drives firmly, forcing, drags that, with no timing, down to long on
all defensive from Gibbs now, but has to, good line and length
Hats off to Chigumbura, maintains a good length, has Gibbs beaten by one cutting back high into the pads
keeps it up to the bat on line, stroked towards the mid-off
just a touch short, nearly on line, chops a cut into the off side, good over from Chigumbura
down the pitch and just swings down the line, clears long on
looks to sweep but a good loop on the ball, beats the bat into the pad, but outside the off
sweeps, beaten as that turns sharply to the off
got a good loop on the ball going now, sweeps again and is beaten once again
decides to drop the sweep, gets back, waits and nudges just wide of the short fine leg
looped up on the off, gently stroked into the off side field
line and length, defends towards extra cover
leg side line, Gibbs plays across the line, beaten into the pad, appeal turned down, going down leg, quick run taken
well forward, nudges from the off to the on side, easy single taken
looks to go across the line again, into the pad and a lot closer than before but is drifting down
all defensive to one just outside off, but keeping a nice length
lets that slip down the leg side, Gibbs flicks, but no contact
slower ball just on off, gets well forward and strokes to mid-off
round the wicket now, good flight in, defence to the off
flighted up from round the wicket, Smith again goes on the sweep, the same one that he has missed often today, not this time, an edge is well taken by Taibu and Davis agrees
gets half forward, looking for the turn, pushes nervously to the off
A lot more confident, gets a stride in and strokes to cover
flighted up from round the wicket to another left hander, stroked from the front foot into the covers to get off the mark
over the wicket to the right hander who drives neatly to long off
Field is up and Gibbs goes over the top of cover
slow ball is dragged down on the off, just too wide
over corrects and Taibu dives away to the leg to stop 5 wides
back on line and has Gibbs defending to the off
walks across to the off, whips that into the on field, straight at mid-on
driving on the up and again can not beat the field, straight at extra cover
down the pitch, goes down on one kneee and sends that one bounce over midwicket
fine leg is up in the ring, walks inside it and flicks wide of the man, races away towards long leg
Duminy still trying to make his mark in international cricket is all defensive
drives, but a bit late on the shot, edges, and a bit fortunate, right between the legs of the slips
gets forward, bat well behind the pad, defends to the off
just on the off, nice loop on it, dabs from the front foot wide of cover
full arm ball is firmly dug out and driven towards extra cover, fumble allows a second but Gibbs wants the strike
full on the off, drives a cracker, a meter either way would have been four but he hit that straight at extra cover
and again, drives firmly at cover
this time he hits it even harder, straight at the bowler who decides that it is a lot safer to get out of the way
now he goes over the covers, not timed perfectly, but enough to clear the man leaping on the edge of the circle
on the back foot, late cuts that too third man
gets well be hind one that is short in length, pushes to the off
oh dear, Gibbs has now switched on, slashes the cut over the inner ring
follows that up with the lofted drive that takes it well over long off
round the wicket now, cramps him up a bit, dabs to the off
on the back foot, playing in the V, runs it to extra cover
well forward, all defensive to the off
had enough, down the pitch, and that sails over long on for his 100
has a little waft outside off, beaten
thats a bit too wide as he pushes across the left hander
changes the angle and comes around the wicket, this time he bangs that is but even wider outside off
gets the line right, touch short, defends to cover
line and length, gets forward all defensive
outside off, full, drives, not timed, runs away to mid-off
on the drive once again, feet not going anywhere, inside edge into the pad
again forward, timing completely off, drives late, off the bat into the foot
slower ball on line and length, stroked towards mid-off
full outside off, leg cutter gets the edge as he drives, races away fine, a nod of the head from Gibbs, he knows he was a bit lucky there
slower ball out the back of the hand, defends to the off
another ball out the back of the hand, nudges towards short fine leg, quick run with Duminy as fast as Taibu and Matsikenyeri between the wickets
leg side ball, back and runs that fine of the fine leg who does get across to cut off
leg stump again, but htis time not fine enough to beat the short fine leg
short on the off, punches firmly straight at the cover
just a touch short, gets back outside off, delicate little late cut
gets back working it to the on side, still no timing and one can see it in his face, just not happy with himself
full stroked towards a deep mid-off
well forward, dabs to the on side
just short of length, gets forward defending and again the shake of the head
full on the off, strokes the drive to the cover sweeper, Gibbs looks happy to take a not out home tonight
thats more like it, just over pitched and a classic left handers drive past cover
width outside off and again he finds his timing and that is an easy put away square on the off
just short of a length outside off, cuts from the front foot, can not find the gap at gully
line and length, well forward, defends to the off
just outside off, gets forward, opens the face and runs that just wide of deep gully who saves diving to his right
touch short, gets back and pushes gently to the on side
fuller ball on the legs, drives straight, long on in to gather
full on the off, drives very well but the sweeper is back
just short of length, on the legs, stroked down the ground
looks to go over the leg side, drags that off the inside half of the bat to wide midwicket

oh dear Gibbs, gets the shorter ball he was waiting for, whips that to the leg side, in the air, Utseya at midwicket jumps, both hands raised, and it sticks, great catch to bring an entertaining innings to an end
drives down the ground
just on the off, gets forward and strokes to the off
touch short and that is punched firmly into the covers off the back foot, nice bit of fielding at cover
just on the off, slower ball, defends to the off
again the slower ball, out the back of the hand, defends to the off
another slower ball, de Villiers not in the mood to lose his wicket, solid defence
First attempt is called a dead ball as someone walks in front of the screen as the ball is bowled, the real ball however was a touch leg side and lofted well over the midwicket for a one bounce four
